snippet: The baleful rhetoric in a territorial dispute between China and Japan took a turn for the worse on Wednesday as Beijing signaled that the issue was now one of its "core interests," terminology that puts the matter on the level of political issues...
abstract: The baleful rhetoric in a territorial dispute between China and Japan took a turn for the worse on Wednesday as Beijing signaled that the issue was now one of its "core interests," terminology that puts the matter on the level of political issues like Taiwan and Tibet.

headline.main: Will China Arm Its Fishermen to Protect a 'Core Interest'?
